Qualifiers.rule_name: Attached garage setbacks equal to main dwelling
Qualifiers.scope: Setback compliance for attached garages (page titled for attached garages/carports; bullet text expressly mentions attached garages).
exclusions: Coverage of attached carports is ambiguous because the title mentions carports but the bullet text mentions only garages
ambiguous_language: Title references 'attached garages/carports' while the operative rule text states 'Attached garages'; coverage of attached carports is unclear

Variables.name: lot.type
Variables.description: Lot configuration affecting applicable setback sides

Variables.name: main_dwelling.setback_front_min
Variables.description: Required minimum front setback for the main dwelling

Variables.name: main_dwelling.setback_interior_side_min
Variables.description: Required minimum interior side setback for the main dwelling

Variables.name: main_dwelling.setback_street_side_min
Variables.description: Required minimum street-side setback for the main dwelling (corner lots only)

Variables.name: main_dwelling.setback_rear_min
Variables.description: Required minimum rear setback for the main dwelling

Variables.name: garage_attached.setback_front
Variables.description: Front setback of the attached garage

Variables.name: garage_attached.setback_interior_side
Variables.description: Interior side setback of the attached garage

Variables.name: garage_attached.setback_street_side
Variables.description: Street-side setback of the attached garage (corner lots only)

Variables.name: garage_attached.setback_rear
Variables.description: Rear setback of the attached garage

Constants.name: standard_reference.main_dwelling_setbacks
Constants.value: Use the setback standards required for the main dwelling as the baseline for attached garage compliance
Constants.description: Cross-referenced standard defining the required setbacks for the principal dwelling
Constants.source: This document references but does not include specific distances; obtain from primary zoning setback tables

notes: Interprets 'must comply with same setbacks as main dwelling' to mean attached garage must meet or exceed each minimum setback that applies to the main dwelling for the corresponding yard.
ambiguous_language: Whether attached carports are included is unclear; enforcement currently scoped to attached garages only.

cross_references.purpose: Defines the numerical minimums the attached garage must meet

hierarchical: Attached garage is treated as part of the principal building mass for setback purposes

logical_dependencies.affects: whether street-side setback comparison is evaluated

Qualifiers.rule_name: Uncovered parking location constraints (front yard and street-side yard)
Qualifiers.scope: Siting of uncovered parking spaces on a lot relative to front yard and street-side yard
applicability: All lots proposing uncovered parking spaces (including spaces in side yards or driveways)
Corner lots (front yard and street-side yard provisions apply)
exclusions: Covered/roofed parking spaces (garages, carports) are not governed by this rule
ambiguous_language: The term 'beyond' in 'beyond the required frontyard' could be interpreted as at or past the setback line (>=) or strictly past it (>).
The phrase 'beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard' is ambiguous as to whether location exactly at 10 ft is permitted.

Variables.name: lot.type
Variables.description: Lot configuration affecting presence of street-side yard

Variables.name: yard.front.required_depth
Variables.description: Required depth of the front yard measured from the front lot line

Variables.name: yard.street_side.exists
Variables.description: Whether a street-side yard exists (corner lots typically yes)

Variables.name: uncovered_space[i].distance_from_front_lot_line_min
Variables.description: Minimum distance of each uncovered parking space from the front lot line (nearest point of the space)

Variables.name: uncovered_space[i].distance_from_street_side_lot_line_min
Variables.description: Minimum distance of each uncovered parking space from the street-side lot line (nearest point of the space)

Constants.name: street_side_buffer_depth
Constants.description: Depth of prohibited zone from the street-side lot line for uncovered parking spaces

all.interpretation_note: Treats 'beyond the required frontyard' as at or behind the front setback line; see ambiguous_language.

then_all.interpretation_note: Uses strict greater-than per 'beyond the first 10''; see ambiguous_language.

notes: This rule effectively establishes a 'no-parking area' for uncovered spaces consisting of the entire required front yard and the first 10 ft of the street-side yard on corner lots.
Examples on the page show compliant placements: in the side yard and in a driveway located behind the front setback line.
ambiguous_language: Whether a space exactly at the 10 ft line in the street-side yard is allowed is unclear.
Whether a space exactly at the front setback line is allowed is unclear; this implementation allows it (>=).

cross_references.reference: Definition and measurement of 'required front yard'

cross_references.purpose: Determines presence and measurement baseline for the 10 ft buffer

logical_dependencies.affects: whether the 10 ft street-side constraint is enforced

derived_mappings.name: no_parking_area_for_uncovered_spaces
derived_mappings.definition: Union of the required front yard area and the first 10 ft strip of the street-side yard (where present)
